entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:37 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 6:00 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Temperature: 6.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 6.2°C
Wind: SSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. High plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
